content: During the quarter, we sold the Sheraton Ann Arbor in Michigan for $36 million which $34.5 million was in cash and $1.5 million is due in the future equating to an estimated trailing 12-month cap rate of 3.9% and a 2019 cap rate of 7.7%. Adjusted EBITDAre was $82.1 million for the quarter, which reflected a growth rate of 75% over the prior year quarter. During the third quarter, our portfolio recovered 98% of our group room revenue relative to the same time period in 2019, and we continue to see acceleration from this segment.
